rows.label: qst702201_msg0001
rows.name: Ah! Adel-sama!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0002
rows.name: Hello, Veritas. Is everything alright?

rows.label: qst702201_msg0003
rows.name: There is one thing to report, sir!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0004
rows.name:
To be frank... I've dropped
the vault key, sir!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0005
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0006
rows.name: Oh dear, that is a problem.

rows.label: qst702201_msg0007
rows.name:
A problem? Isn't that where you
keep your important things?

rows.label: qst702201_msg0008
rows.name:
Yes, ma'am! It holds all of the
Olgo family's assets, from heirlooms
to everyday items, ma'am.

rows.label: qst702201_msg0009
rows.name: All... All their assets...!!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0010
rows.name: Adel-sama!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0011
rows.name: Let's look for it! Right now!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0012
rows.name: How kind. Are you that worried?

rows.label: qst702201_msg0013
rows.name:
Of course I am! I know all
too well the weight of 1G and
how hard it is to earn it.

rows.label: qst702201_msg0014
rows.name:
And with heirlooms inside, it's
even worse. If someone with
bad intentions finds it...

rows.label: qst702201_msg0015
rows.name: Ah, no need to worry about that, ma'am.

rows.label: qst702201_msg0016
rows.name:
There's a Grafton Feris den
in the Rakina Plains. I dropped
it deep inside, ma'am.

rows.label: qst702201_msg0017
rows.name:
So there's no worry of a
person picking it up. I'm
not that foolish, ma'am!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0018
rows.name:
Dropping it was foolish enough.
Why were you in a place like
that in the first place?

rows.label: qst702201_msg0019
rows.name:
You can get good medicinal herbs around
there, ma'am. I wanted to bring some to my
grandma and got carried away picking them...

rows.label: qst702201_msg0020
rows.name:
And a Grafton Feris came back
to its den and attacked you?

rows.label: qst702201_msg0021
rows.name:
Exactly, ma'am! I dropped it
while I was running away, ma'am!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0022
rows.name: You...

rows.label: qst702201_msg0023
rows.name:
B-but it's an important
thing, ma'am, so I always
carry it with me, ma'am!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0024
rows.name: In any case, we'll retrieve the key.

rows.label: qst702201_msg0025
rows.name:
Thank you for being honest.
I'm glad you weren't hurt.

rows.label: qst702201_msg0026
rows.name: A-Adel-sama...

rows.label: qst702201_msg0027
rows.name:
You're really too nice
for your own good.
